snippet.title: Arson (Horror Game)
snippet.description:
GENRE: Horror/Game

DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR FREE (WINDOWS)
http://gamejolt.com/games/arson/221019
(Warning: The game has no sounds for now)

Arson is a short stealth horror game about escaping from a deranged arsonist dressed as Santa. Will you be able to get out of the house alive? Or get burned by the arsonist's fire? Discover all 6 endings and find out!

WARNING: Someone pretending to be me put the game in Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=852732700 planning to sell the game that's meant to be free.
